Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. (Parish Health Facilities) -- 1 Mill - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Union, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a special tax of one (1) mill on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $151,000 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2023 and ending with the year 2032, for the purpose of paying for the operation, maintenance and support of public health facilities in the Parish?
